name: Waifu Puzzles
description:
This is a funny puzzle game where you need build anime girls from scattered fragments of a picture.
Features:
-Genre of the game: puzzles
-Theme: anime
-10 pictures
-6 sizes of each picture (You can complete one puzzle even in 6 different sizes)
-Various of anime girls (in different costumes, with different hair colors, with different eye colors)
-Funny gameplay (just select a puzzle and then drag the pieces to complete the picture)
-Calm soundtrack
-Steam Achievements
